title: Introducing One Minute With the Bible
description: One Minute With the Bible is a new podcast project from the Christian Standard Bible. You'll find short episodes organized by themes in the Bible with several Scripture passages. Listen to an episode when you find it convenient as something to dwell on, or listen to every episode as they release daily and you'll make it through the Bible in a year.
itunes:author: Christian Standard Bible
